definition: to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)
relation/relationship/to concern/to affect/to have to do with/guanxi/CL:個|个[ge4]
variant of 聯繫|联系[lian2 xi4]
to have sexual relations with sb/to have dealings with
relations between levels of production/socio-economic relations
industrial relations/relations between labor and capital
to seek contact with sb for one's own benefit/to suck up to sb
variant of 譜系|谱系[pu3 xi4]
favoritism shown to sb because of the influence of the person's wife or other female relative/(by extension) favoritism towards relatives, friends or associates

sentences.english: The new teacher really rates with the director of our department.
sentences.chinese: 這位新來的教師深受我係系主任的好評。

sentences.english: This system can be extended to realize the multi-center data acquisition, and the measurement of many-headed ignition coil.
sentences.chinese: 將此係統進行擴展可實現多頭點火線圈的測試。

sentences.english: This is the end point of the Bladder Meridian of Foot-Taiyin, from where it reaches to the Foot-Shaoyin Meridian.
sentences.chinese: 此係足太陽膀胱經末穴，從這裏到達足少陰腎經。

sentences.english: The present invention relates to a wire-brush and its manufacturing method.
sentences.chinese: 本發明係一種鋼絲刷及製作方法。

sentences.english: After that, I lace my shoes climbing, take some chalk and to go on the first hold.
sentences.chinese: 之後我係緊鞋帶，摸把鎂粉開始抓第一個點。

sentences.english: There were knots in the rope at intervals of a foot.
sentences.chinese: 每隔一步的間隔，那條繩子上就係有一個繩結。

sentences.english: It was only the yogurt or cultured milk products with lactic acid bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 就係得酸奶酪同酸奶製品有乳酸菌架咋。

sentences.english: Higuera started creating the series in 2012.
sentences.chinese: 希格拉於2012年開始創作此係列。

sentences.english: Top up weekly with Lubrication Engineers 4090-H1 Quinplex food-grade grease.
sentences.chinese: 每週須給此係統加滿食品級潤滑脂。

sentences.english: Using WCR lines with CMS cytoplasm as female parent to develop new restorer lines by backcrossing.
sentences.chinese: 以同質廣親和恢復係爲母本轉育新的恢復系。

sentences.english: The system executes simple harmonic motion .
This system can support hardware basic for dynamic holograph display.
sentences.chinese: 此係統可爲動態全息顯示提供硬件基礎。

sentences.english: This forum is provided for travelers planning to visit Bali.
sentences.chinese: 本討論區係爲準備到巴里島旅遊之遊客所設置。

definition: to be at, in or on (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 在[zai4]
old variant of 慨[kai3]/to sigh (with emotion)
so (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 這樣|这样[zhe4 yang4]
Cantonese particle equivalent to 了[le5] or 過|过[guo4]
(literary) to wipe away (tears)/to press with one's fingers/to soak
what? (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 什麼|什么[shen2 me5]
to look down upon (classical)/to see/to look at (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 看[kan4]
